channel.title: ::char help please
channel.description:
kk well i found some new clothes i wanna add to ::char BUTTTTT idk how to could someone please show me how to add them that would be great thank you
heres the robes i wanted to add. [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2r1zg2x.jpg[/img]
i wanna add them so that when u do ::char you can get them robes...

item.title: ::char help please
item.dc:creator: @bobsisland bobsisland
item.description:
@bobsisland wrote:

it would need you to have a model. then put them in your client. if you dont have one you need one to add new cloth. then you could maybe just add a new item with the model to a shop or a man giving you them when you start. that would be how i would do it . … dont know much about clients and adding new models/modelling but you bould use silabsofts editor.

Read full topic
